name: Lily's Little Fantasies
description:
==== SUBMISSION FOR GETA GAME JAM 8 ==== For better performance, you can use the download link below instead of playing the game in the brower Fast-Description

Travel upon a great journey to fight Lily’s demons, using the imagination of this cute little girl to find your way into her nightmares and repaint them into dreams !

Controls

WASD or Arrows + space to move

X to shoot during nightmare / interact during daytime.

Lore Description

Lily had a lot of family problems recently, but she’s quite young, so she doesn’t really understand why her parents are constantly shouting on each other.

Her only quiet place is her bedroom, with her sweet teddy bear, her bookshelf (where her mother stored some traditional tales), and her flowers that she loved taking care with her father.

But, most importantly, she mostly found another shelter in her soooooo comfy bed, during the night, thinking about what gone wrong in her not so long life. With the imagination she got, her nights are getting more and more terrifying, and she might not keep her sanity much longer.

The no-more-so naive Lily decides to face her demons and clean her bad thoughts during the night, repainting them into lovely pink flowers.

But will she be able to keep this up ?

She needs to face them 4 nights, while staying in touch with what she likes during the daytime in her bedroom. After this journey, it will finally be over, and Lily could surely fall asleep without any fear again.
